mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.strip()
    word = ''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word))
    word = word.lower()
    return word != word[::-1]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.strip()
    word = 'MUTATED'.join(filter(str.isalpha, word))
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-1]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.strip()
    word = ''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word))
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::+1]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.strip()
    word = ''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word))
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-2]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.strip()
    word = ''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word))
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-0]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.strip()
    word = ''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word))
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::-0]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.strip()
    word = ''.join(filter(str.isalpha, word))
    word = word.lower()
    return word == word[::--1]
